column1: Forensic Science and Criminal Justice - MSc
column5: The course is designed for those who wish to pursue a career in forensic science or related fields. The program covers topics such as the evaluation and interpretation of different forms of evidence, the application of various techniques used in forensic examinations, and how to present findings in court. Students also have the opportunity to specialize in specific areas through elective modules. Upon completion of the program, graduates will be equipped with the skills and knowledge needed to confidently argue for their interpretations of forensic evidence and act as credible expert witnesses.
